name: Chicken Wings Stuffed With Chevre
keywords: appetizer, chicken wings, goat cheese, winter

recipeInstructions.text: Stir together the cheese and scallions. Separate the wings at the joint and save the tips for another purpose, like making soup. Loosen the skin over the tops, making a pocket between the skin and the meat. Fill each pocket with about 1 tablespoon of the cheese mixture. Do not overfill.
Combine the garlic, rosemary, salt, pepper and oil in a large bowl. Add the wings and coat well. Refrigerate for several hours, or up to one day.
Preheat the broiler. Broil the wings until the skin is browned and the chicken is cooked through, about 8 minutes.
